title: Yoshi's Starfruit Summer Salad
author: Andy
description: A refreshing salad made with star fruit accompanied by a light mustard dressing, with tiny bread 'eggs'.
directions: In a small jar with a lid, combine the olive oil, honey, apple cider vinegar, Dijon mustard, salt, and black pepper. Cover and shake until mixed well.

Toss the sliced star fruits, lettuce, arugula, red onion, avocado, and pecans together in a large bowl. Add the Dijon mustard dressing and toss again. Then top with the crumbled feta. Toss lightly and serve immediately.
